DOC.brief_summary: single-center study carried out in order to evaluate in prospective among patients seen or treated in the pediatric endocrinology unit and multidisciplinary management of obesity, the potential number of patients eligible for surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Study on the Appropriateness of Bariatric Surgery in Adolescents
DOC.detailed_description: This is a feasibility study in order to file a subsequent national project as part of a PHRC on bariatric surgery in adolescents.
